thread.title_full: eGlobal Digital Cameras Australia reviewed by Eileen Sweeney

author: Eileen Sweeney
title: Eileen Sweeney
text: When I factored in shipping eGlobaL digital cameras had the best online rate for my OnePlus 3 phone. I received my phone within 3 days. Theyâ€‹ accidentally sent the wrong adaptor but responded to my queries within hours. When they realised their mistake they sent me a refund so I could purchase my own adaptor. All in all I couldn't be happier with my purchase and with the excellent customer service.
